mapper.select: SELECT global_board_no AS boardId, board_title, user.user_id, user.user_name, board_write_dt, board_edit_dt, board_deadline, board_notice, board_assignment FROM board LEFT JOIN user ON user.global_user_no=board.board_user_no WHERE board_room_no=( SELECT global_room_no FROM room WHERE room_name=#{boardRoom} )
